Section.Catchline: Vehicles permitted to be driven during driving skills tests.

SectionBody.Text: A person who does not possess a valid driver’s license may drive a noncommercial or commercial motor vehicle during a driving skills test conducted in accordance with s. 322.12(3) and (4)(a), if the person has passed the vision, hearing, road rules, and road signs tests ordinarily administered to applicants for a Class E license, and, if required, has passed the commercial driver’s license knowledge and appropriate endorsement tests.
